Professional Web Design & Development Services by Uys Design

Custom Code – No Page Builders or WordPress

I take a unique approach to web design. Unlike others who rely on page builders or WordPress, I hand-code every website from scratch. This ensures:

  • ✓ Fully Custom Designs: Tailored to your brand and goals.
  • ✓ Zero Bloat: No wasted code, so your site loads instantly.
  • ✓ Perfect Google Page Speed Scores: Achieve top marks on Core Web Vitals.
  • ✓ Unmatched Security: No databases or plugins to exploit, making our sites virtually unhackable.
  • ✓ No Maintenance Hassles: Forget constant updates or plugin management.

Why It Matters

  • ✓ Faster Load Times: Capture more leads by keeping visitors engaged.
  • ✓ Higher Conversions: Better ad performance and lower bounce rates.
  • ✓ Improved Google Rankings: Dominate search results with faster, optimized sites.
  • ✓ Enhanced Security: Protect your business with hack-proof websites.
  • ✓ Boosted Google Business Profile: Increase visibility in local searches.

Faster Load Times = Higher Conversions

In today's competitive online landscape, every second counts. If your website takes more than 3 seconds to load, you could lose up to 50% of your visitors. At Uys Design, I create custom-coded websites that load instantly, ensuring your audience stays engaged and converts into leads.

Small Business SEO Specialist

At Uys Design, I know that web design and SEO go hand in hand. As an in-house SEO expert, I specialize in:

  • ✓ Content Creation: Crafting helpful, engaging content that ranks.
  • ✓ Backlink Strategies: Building authority through high-quality links.
  • ✓ Ongoing Monitoring: Continuously optimizing your site for better results.

Forget the basics like meta tags and sitemaps—those are standard. Real SEO is an active process, and I'm here to guide you every step of the way.
